Diagnosis
	1. Peritoneal mesothelioma with omental disease
	Date of diagnosis
	January 2024

	Treatment aim
	Palliative

	Summary of completed treatment and relevant dates

	Surgery
	15 Jan 2024 Diagnostic laparoscopy and biopsy

	Chemotherapy
	Carboplatin/Pemetrexed commenced 01 Feb 2024

	Clinical studies
	None

	Current disease status
	Progressive disease

	Current issues
	Increasing abdominal distension and early satiety

	Summary of consultation
	Reviewed today following cycle 3 Carboplatin/Pemetrexed. Unfortunately CT performed on 15/4/24 shows disease progression with increasing omental disease and new ascites. Performance status has deteriorated to ECOG 2 with increasing abdominal symptoms and reduced oral intake. After discussion of options, we will discontinue current chemotherapy due to disease progression and deteriorating status.

	Further investigations
	None required

	Medication prescribed
	Prescribed Dexamethasone 4mg daily

	Follow up
	Urgent palliative care referral made
Review in 2 weeks with palliative care team

	Required GP actions
	Please monitor symptoms and continue current supportive medications
